Class BallFactory

java.lang.Object
ball.ballAgent.BallFactory
public class BallFactory extends Object
Generator of Various kind of Balls, mostly used by testing cases TODO: try to remove static maybe, discuss it with collegues;

    static Ball
    completeBall(double angle, double initialVelocity, SpherePos2D position, double gravity)

    static Ball
    fromFatherBall(Ball ball)
    Creates a Ball with same values of the father (initialVelocity, angle, position) but the updated Value of Dimensions, meaning that a FATHER given as argument will craete two SONs ans a SON will create two GRANDSONs.

    • fromFatherBall

      public static Ball fromFatherBall(Ball ball)
      Creates a Ball with same values of the father (initialVelocity, angle, position) but the updated Value of Dimensions, meaning that a FATHER given as argument will craete two SONs ans a SON will create two GRANDSONs.
      Parameters:
      ball - the father ball
      Returns:
      a child ball
